metadata.title: Thursday, 31st October, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication whether the Government has any plans to construct a bridge across the Kafue River to connect Kang’wena to Luanfula in Solwezi East Parliamentary Constituency.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when rehabilitation works on the Namushakende-Nakanyaa Road in Nalikwanda Parliamentary Constituency will be completed;
(b)    when the culvets at Nakanyaa will be rehabilitated;
(c)    when the rehabilitation of Nakanyaa-Namaumba Road will commence; and
(d)    what the time-frame for completion of the project at (c) above is.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what the time-frame for phasing out of basic schools country-wide, is;
(b)    how many basic schools in Sesheke Parliamentary Constituency will be upgraded to secondary schools; and
(c)    how many secondary schools will be constructed in the Constituency.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    whether the Water Reticulation Project currently going on in Sesheke Parliamentary Constituency will be extended to the following places:
(i)    Sesheke Secondary School; (ii)    Nalisa Village; (iii)    M’clop Upper; and (iv)    Lyamango;
(b)    what the name of the contractor working on the Project is;
(c)    what the estimated cost of the Project is; and
(d)    when the project will be completed.

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry whether the Government has any plans to facilitate the establishment of a glass factory in Western Province in light of the availability of sand in the area.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply - Motion (11th October) - Resumption of Debate - (The Deputy Minister for Copperbelt Province).
